BATTLE.DESCRIPTION:
Players: {{ players }} / Kills: {{ kills }} / Fame: {{ fame }}
Duration: {{ duration }}
BATTLE.EVENT: A battle ocurred between {{ guilds }} guilds!

COMMAND_ERROR: There was an error while executing this command. Please try again later.

HELP.LIST: Lists tracked players, guilds and alliances.
HELP.TRACK: Tracks a player, guild or alliance.
HELP.UNTRACK: Stops tracking a player, guild or alliance.

KILL.SOLO_1: And it was a solo kill.

RANKING.GUILD_RANKING_DESCRIPTION:
Total Kill Fame: {{ killFame }}
Total Death Fame: {{ deathFame }}
RANKING.GUILD_RANKING_SET: Guild Ranking display mode is set to '{{ guildRanking }}'
RANKING.NO_DATA: No data available for guild '{{{ guild }}}'. Give the bot a day to fetch data and try again.
RANKING.PVP_RANKING_SET: PvP Ranking display mode is set to '{{ pvpRanking }}'

CHANNEL.NOT_SET: WARNING: Channel to send notifications is not set. Please set up a channel in /settings.
CHANNEL.NULL: Please input a channel for notifications.
CHANNEL.SET: Channel for category '{{ category }}' defined to {{{ channel }}}.

GUILD_TAGS.DESCRIPTION: Show guild tags in player's names.

SETTINGS.SET: Notifications for category `{{ category }}` are `{{ option }}`

SPLIT_LOOT_VALUE.DESCRIPTION: Split the loot value between gear and inventory.

SUBSCRIPTION.ACTIONS: Invalid action, please select one of: {{ actions }}.
SUBSCRIPTION.CONFIRMED: Your subscription is now confirmed. You can now start using the bot. :)

ERROR.FETCH_FAIL: Failed to fetch subscriber list. Please try again later.
ERROR.MAIL_NOT_FOUND: Couldn't find your e-mail in subscriber list.
ERROR.PATREON_DISCORD_NOT_FOUND: Couldn't find your account subscriber list. Please link your Discord account with patreon account and try again.

STATUS.DAYS_REMAINING: Your subscription has {{{ days }}} day(s) remaining
STATUS.INACTIVE: Your subscription isn't activated yet. Please check with bot adminstrator.

TRACK.ALREADY_TRACKED: I am already tracking this item.

CHANNEL.CUSTOM: Notifications will be sent to the channel: {{{ channel }}}
CHANNEL.DEFAULT: Notifications will be sent to the default channel.

ERRORS.FETCH_FAILED: Unable to fetch track settings. Please try again later.

TRACK.FREE_LIMIT_REACHED: You reached the limit of {{ limit }} {{ type }} for free servers. Upgrading to the Premium status will increase your slots to {{ premiumLimit }} {{ type }}. For more details, please visit the [premium page]({{{ url }}}).
TRACK.LIMIT_REACHED: You already reached the limit of {{ limit }} items in this list.
TRACK.MISSING_PARAMETERS: Please set at least one option.
TRACK.NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't find anything with this name.
TRACK.SEARCH_FAILED: Failed to fetch data from game servers. Please try again.
TRACK.TRACKING_DISABLED: Sorry, tracking of {{ type }} is disabled. Please contact bot admin for more information.
TRACK.UNSUPPORTED_TYPE: Unsupported type of tracking. Type !help to see more.
